src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LC : What time is it , please ? @ G ( LC , get-info ( time ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't know the answer . LC : Yeah , well it 's not much . There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RP : Do you know the price of a coffee ? [MASK] ARI : No . Sorry , I do n't have this information . LC : Is the coffee from a vending machine or a cafeteria ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . LC : Go ahead . ARI : Can I help you ? RP : I can ask ... RP : Is the cafeteria open at this time ? src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RC : I 'd like to have something with my friend who is sick . Is there a cafeteria ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) [start] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . LP : Hello Mr Robot . I 'm looking for the lifts please . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . RC : Hello , I 'd like to go to the cardiology department . I was told it was on the second floor . Is there a lift to get there ? To go up ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : And can you tell me where it is please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [end] LP : Hello , can we have something to eat here ? @ G ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : Yes , absolutely . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . @ AG ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) LP : Oh , how lucky , thank you . @ CG ( LP+RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : Thank you .

[MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . LP : What time is my appointment with the doctor ? @ G ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : I think it 's 10 o'clock . @ AG ( LP , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : What time is the appointment ? @ G ( RC , get-info ( appt ( time ) ) ) RC : I have an appointment with the doctor . @ G ( RC , get-info ( appt ( general_info ) ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . @ AG ( RC , get-info ( appt ( general_info ) ) ) LP : And who is my geriatrician ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : That 's a shame . LP : And where is the consultation room to go see my doctor ? RC : Is it my turn ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you .
